description: This aromatic, spiced warm salad features the crumbly texture of blue cheese with the crunch of carrot.
keywords: Green salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Peanut free
name: Crispy Kale Salad with Blue Cheese & Carrot Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Toss the kale in the sesame oil and place on a baking sheet. Empty the drained chickpeas into a baking dish.
Place the kale on the top shelf of the oven and place the chickpeas in the middle tray and bake everything for 20 minutes or until the kale becomes crisp.

Combine your dressing ingredients of oil, vinegar and ginger in a serving bowl and set to one side. Remove the kale and chick peas from the oven and place into a serving bowl. Mix together with the grated carrot and drizzle with the dressing to serve.
